text: You find yourself in a lush, dark jungle. You do not recall how you got there or why you are there. You get up and realize that there are two paths to take. Suddenly, you hear a voice that tells you, 'You must pass ten tests for your freedom or you will die in this jungle.' You scramble to choose either the left ot the right path, as you now realize how dire the situation is.

The left path leads to a clearing with a white sheet holding two items that you can pick up. There is a sign that states you can only choose two items. There is a machete and a rope. You must pick one of the items to add to your inventory.

The right path leads to a hole where you fall into a pit of venomous Brazilian wandering spiders. One bite will harm you, but multiple bites will kill you. Your only chance to escape to climb out of the pit or sit there and accept your fate. What will you do?

options.text: Your attempt to climb out failed. You thought you were Indiana Jones or something? The spiders' bites cause you to lose your life. Restart?
You accept your fate and succumb to the spiders. Restart?

text: The next area leads to a temple blocked off by vines and vegetation. You use the machete to chop down the vegetation and enter the temple. The temple has a cold, mystifying air that makes you feel uneasy. A voice tells you to enter one of the two doors in front of you for your next challenge.

The next area leads to a temple blocked off by vines and vegetation. You see a way in through a window or a way to reach a bridge that has a door to enter the temple. You can use the rope to swing from a large tree to the open window or swing to the bridge and enter through the door.

options.text: You chose to enter through the window
You chose to swing onto the bridge

text: The left door leads to a trap room that where you do not know what the trap is. However, you scan the room and see a skeleton attached to the right wall. You do not know what the trap is. How will you proceed?

options.text: You walk straight through the middle of the room
You hug the left wall believing that you will evade the trap

text: The right door leads to a room with two different items you can pick up. A voice tells you that if you choose the correct item, you will be free to escape and win the game. If you choose the wrong one, you will die. The two options are an old ballpoint pen or a flawless ruby. Which will you choose?

You secure the rope to the tree and successfully swing into the window. You enter a room lit by torches and feel something slithering across your feet. The voice tells you that you must escape the room and you see that it is full of venomous snakes. How will you proceed?

options.text: You walk very slowly making no sound
You run quickly, making sure not to step on any of the snakes
